verbs.description: As ridiculous as the NFL ’s new rule on [ARG0: players] [V: protesting] [ARGM-LOC: on the sidelines] [ARGM-MNR: by kneeling during the National Anthem] is , Trump ’s response to it is far worse . He actually trotted out the old “ if you do n’t love this country , why do n’t you leave it ” bit of idiocy . On Fox and Friends , of course , where he …
